title: Genetic distributions and diversity analyses of 23 Y-STR loci in Xi'an Han population.
summary: Xi'an is the most populous city in Northwest China, in which most residents are Han Chinese. In this study, we analyzed genetic distributions of 23 Y-STR loci in Xi'an Han population and evaluated genetic affinities between Xi'an Han popu …
abstract: Xi'an is the most populous city in Northwest China, in which most residents are Han Chinese. In this study, we analyzed genetic distributions of 23 Y-STR loci in Xi'an Han population and evaluated genetic affinities between Xi'an Han population and other reference populations based on the PowerPlex® Y23 System.
